thread.title: Excellent location!
thread.title_full: Excellent location! - Review of Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gabriellecirilo
title: Excellent location!
text:
Stayed here for a week, everything was very good and the room was big enough to fit 3 of us. Beds are comfortable and had a view of the near buildings, the hotel personnel was really friendly and helpful. Is near the Madison Square Garden, Empire State Building (5th Ave) and Time Square. They offered a good breakfast every morning. Ana Tavares was very helpful and paid attention to every little detail to make us feel at home.
I would definitely come back and recommend it to a friend!
Room Tip: Higher floors have the best view of the street and buildings around the hotel See more room tips
